title: dogs_resting_on_retrieved_bedding_evening
summary: Dogs resting together using retrieved bedding under limited household resources.
description: This data unit documents dogs resting in the evening using bedding that was sun-dried earlier in the day and retrieved prior to use. The activity reflects routine animal care and welfare management under limited household resources, ensuring warmth and rest during nighttime conditions.

reference_context.note: Completes the daily bedding cycle from drying, retrieval, to actual use.

external_reference.note: Image serves as primary evidence of evening resting condition.
